remarks: Domain and range of the unit vector generator; ring condition required to be sure 1 and 0 are actually in the ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
statement:
uvcff.u $e |- U = ( R unitVec I ) $.
uvcff.y $e |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
uvcff.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
uvcff $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> U : I --> B ) $.
